title: Hybrid Language Course Design and Quality Management

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, training pre-service educators in designing and quality-managing language education programs. Combines simulation/VR-based practice with in-person instruction.

learning_goals: Learners can design hybrid language courses applying Quality Matters (QM) standards
Learners can develop and evaluate language education activities in simulation/VR environments
Learners can measure and improve quality metrics of curricula in hybrid learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
